post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, September 11
post.Content:
Another quiet week as per usual in September (with JavaOne coming up soon).

  • Dirk Lemmermann has posted another JavaFX tip - styling the JavaFX ListView control.
  • GOXR3PLUS STUDIO has two GitHub projects using JavaFX - XR3Player (an 'advanced JavaFX media player') and JavaFX Web Browser (a 'web browser made in Java and JavaFX').
